title: Looking for fonts that are similar to this S
content:
I know this

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120113104716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mls_4131.png)

is helvetica, but I am looking for other fonts that share this same quality.

I know akkurat is one, but what are some suggestions for others with a broader assortment of weights.
author: Capnhud

comments.content: Have you seen Stephen's article of [Helvetica alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20120113104716/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/helvetica-and-alternatives-to-helvetica/)?
Some styles of Chalet from House

- arial ;o)  
- nimbus sans  
- ff bau  
- neutral  
- folio  
- swiss  
- akzidenz grotesk

Thanks for all the suggestions I think Galaxy Polaris is perfect.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
